name: Hexa Jigsaw Challenge
description:
Hexa Jigsaw Challenge is a super addictive puzzle game that challenges you to fit hexa pieces into the board and complete images. Test yourself and Exercise your brain!
This game is a perfect match for any puzzle lover to play an enjoy hundreds of addictive and fun jigsaws.

Play today and join the fun! Drag and drop the hexa shapes, fill the board, and complete the level. This incredible game is simple and easy to learn, perfect for everyone to enjoy!

Enjoy Fun Game Features:
- Easy to play: Just tap the hexa pieces and drag them on the puzzle board to move them around and complete beautiful photos
- Free & fun game: Solve free puzzles and enjoy hours of fun!
- Plenty of challenges: Complete the level goals before time runs out
- Play in an offline game mode: Even if you have no WiFi or no internet connection, you can still have fun. Play offline anytime, anywhere.
- Stress reliever: These free jigsaw puzzles are a relaxing way to wind down after a long day
- Boost your skills: Train your brain as you solve new puzzles. This is the best skills game for you!
- Indulge yourself with the top-recommended game: Jigsaw puzzles are highly recommended for having the best fun time!
- High-quality photos collection
- Free hints for more fun: Win free hints to help you complete every challenge
- Compatible with iOS mobile and iPad devices: Whether you have an iPhone, iPad, Hexa Jigsaw Challenge will work on your device

Each level is designed around a different theme and discovers an awesome collection of pictures. Explore cute kittens and pet puzzles, fabulous street art images, interior design worlds, food, sweets quests, and many more. Sharpen your matching skills while completing epic and cool photos, and enjoy loads of awesome levels.


Get ready to have a blast with this exciting jigsaw puzzle game.
This addicting tap and drag game will keep you busy and entertained at any time!

Hexa Jigsaw Challenge is free to download and play but contains in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless turned off at least 24 hrs before the current period ends. Manage subscriptions via iTunes account settings.
